snippet.title: Brick Odyssey - Visual Overhaul Trailer
snippet.description:
The visual update will go live Jan 25th 2024, for the 1 year anniversary of the game release :)

Massive improvements to the pixel art, a few new mechanics and some balance changes. We hope you'll like it :)

Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2211110/?snr=1_5_9__205
